> ::Fliq::
> 
> Fliq stops atop a small hill, looking at the scene
> below him. Its been 
> a while since he'd seen such a wreckage, probably
> not since his ship 
> had crashed on the moon. He cautiously approaches,
> looking around the 
> wreck, and the one good shuttle, to see if there was
> anyone 
> functional. His hand remained close to his gun.

The only things around were one crashed and shot up
Decepticon shuttle, a second, fully functional
Decepticon shuttle sitting by it and three
Decepticons.

One lying dead, looking like it had been shot up...

Another also dead. Its head appeared to have been
blown off...

And another, also motionless but in Stasis Lock.
Heavily damaged but repairable. 

SOMETHING had happened here.

**Strafe**
